description: This file is a PHP source script that handles the web interface for editing wireless network settings, including network name, security mode, channels, and passwords, with embedded JavaScript for client-side validation and interaction.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Retrieves a set of related configuration parameters from device management extension responses, mapping raw data to key-value pairs.

methods.name: click_save
methods.description: Collects form data, constructs a JSON configuration object, and sends it via AJAX to save the wireless network settings.

methods.name: setResetInfo
methods.description: Sends reset or restore commands to reset the Wi-Fi configuration to default settings.

methods.name: init_form
methods.description: Initializes form UI elements based on current device configuration and user permissions.
